// If Tyrion dies, I am gonna riot  :P
     
     
# include <bits/stdc++.h>
# define MOD 1000000007
# define gc getchar
# define LL long long
# define L long
# define pb push_back
# define pINF 999999
# define nINF -999999
using namespace std;
     
     
template<class T>
void scanint(T &x)
{
    register T c = gc();
    x = 0;
    T neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}


int main()
{
    int t;
    scanint(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanint(n);
        if(n & (n-1))
            cout<<"BMEENA\n";
        else
            cout<<"BKUL\n";
    }
    return 0;
}

    // Can a man still be brave if he's afraid?  That is the only time a man can be brave !!
